DescriptionData.Title: Ultimate Silicone Wound Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Ultimate Silicone Wound Kit has high quality appliances and necessary accessories to help you with creating realistic wound effects.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Packed with everything you need for realistic wound effects
Perfect for Halloween, Zombie Walks, film make-up and theatrical performances!
Includes Thi-Vex Thickening Agent, Skin Tite Silicone, Rubber Glass, Silc Pig Pigment, Mixing Sticks & Cups, Fake Teeth, Step-By-Step How-To Guide and Makeup Palette
